But security researchers have uncovered serious exposure risks."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"The Discovery"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"SecurityScorecard researchers have identified over 40,000 exposed OpenClaw instances accessible from the public internet, many running with default configurations and no authentication."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"What is OpenClaw?"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"OpenClaw is an open-source multi-platform AI agent framework supporting:"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"Multi-platform communication (WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord, Signal, Teams, and more)"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"Web UI Agents dashboard for managing agents, tools, skills, and cron jobs"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"Browser control and automation with Chrome/Chromium"}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"File and application control"}],"\n",["$","li","li-4",{"children":"Support for Claude Opus 4.6, GPT-5.3-Codex, and xAI Grok models"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"With over 3,000 community skills on the ClawHub marketplace, it has become one of the most extensible agent platforms available."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Malicious Skills on ClawHub"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"The ClawHub marketplace, while powerful, has become a target for malicious actors:"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"Skills containing prompt injection payloads"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"Data exfiltration through skill dependencies"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"Command injection via unsanitized inputs"}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"Backdoor installations disguised as utility skills"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Mitigation: VirusTotal Integration"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"OpenClaw now includes VirusTotal integration and a built-in code safety scanner:"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"Skills are automatically scanned before installation"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"Community-reported malicious skills are flagged and removed"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"The code safety scanner checks for known malicious patterns"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Enable scanning with:"}],"\n",["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-4","children":["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4","children":"openclaw config set virustotal.enabled true\nopenclaw config set virustotal.api_key YOUR_VT_KEY\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Security Best Practices"}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"1. Security-First Configuration"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Always change default credentials, enable authentication, and bind to localhost (127.0.0.1) unless remote access is specifically needed."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"2. Enable Sandboxing"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Run all skills in sandboxed environments with restricted file system and network access."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"3. VirusTotal Scanning"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Enable VirusTotal integration for all skill installations from ClawHub."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"4. Network Security"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"Use SSH tunnels for remote access"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"Enable HTTPS with valid certificates"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"Implement rate limiting"}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"Monitor access logs regularly"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"5. Keep Updated"}],"\n",["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-4","children":["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4","children":"npm install -g openclaw@latest\n"}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Subscribe to security advisories at openclaw.ai for timely vulnerability notifications."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Conclusion"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"OpenClaw's power and extensibility come with responsibility. The 40,000+ exposed instances serve as a wake-up call: security-first configuration is not optional."}]]}],["$","section",null,{"className":"mt-12 pt-8 border-t border-gray-700","children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mb-6","children":"Related Articles"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6","children":[["$","$L2","4",{"href":"/article/security-alert-malicious-skills","className":"article-card group","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center space-x-2 mb-2","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"inline-flex items-center px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium bg-red-500/10 text-red-400","children":"Security"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs text-gray-500","children":"Feb 5, 2026"}]]}],["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-lg font-semibold text-white group-hover:text-blue-400 transition-colors mb-2","children":"Security Alert: Malicious Skills on Public Registries"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-400 text-sm line-clamp-2","children":"Prompt injection attempts found in publicly available AI agent skills.
